title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' popup action enablement is incorrect.
OB: When attempting to trigger a manual build, the 'Build' option in the popup is always enabled, regardless of whether a build is already in progress or has been completed.
EB: The 'Build' option in the popup should only be enabled when there is no ongoing build or when the build is already done automatically. It should be disabled if a build is currently in progress.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Initiate a build process manually.
3. Observe that the 'Build' option in the popup remains enabled even when the build is in progress or has already been completed.
